name: strong
description: The Sarna Baseball Glove Maintenance Kit is the complete solution for keeping your glove in peak playing condition. Designed for both new and well-loved gloves, this all-in-one kit includes everything you need to clean, condition, and protect your leather—ensuring it stays soft, flexible, and ready for game day.
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on All Orders
All-in-One Kit: Cleaner, conditioner, hog hair brush, horsehair brush, and microfiber cloth
Does Not Darken: Specially formulated to maintain your glove’s original color
Water-Based Formula: Lightweight, non-greasy, and preserves glove structure
Step-by-Step Care: Clean → Condition → Restore for peak glove performance
Long-Lasting Protection: Keeps leather soft, supple, and game-ready season after season
